entries.journal_entry_description: Guard the forward watch position and keep any undead from entering the camp.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Wait here while the entry guard takes a break.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Kill the last of the wave.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: Sounds like you are having fun out there. Come back when you are ready.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Go back to camp and meet with your contact to collect the reward.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Don't move from the guard post! You'll need to do it all over again if you expect to get paid!
entries.task11_comm_message_text: Don't move from the guard post! You'll need to do it all over again if you expect to get paid!
